Enemy Greetings: I'll be takin' your things. Then nobody gets hurt.
Where do ya think you're goin'?
Threats: I'll gut you like a fish!
Think this is my first fight?
I'm gonna put a hole right through your head!

Welcome to the best gun store in the whole of [town]!
You name a gun and I've probably got one somewhere.
Saloon: You look like you could use a drink.

Sheriff: What can I do ya for?
We're here to keep the law of [town].
